features: 👍 [VESA Certified DisplayPort Cable] iVANKY DP to DP Cable(NOT HDMI) is officially certified by the VESA Association, ensuring the highest standards of quality and compatibility. This Display port Cable is ideal for video streaming or gaming, allowing you to effortlessly configure your 4K monitor for an Extended Desktop or Mirrored Displays.

🚀 [Flicker-free Experience] The DP Cable supports high resolutions up to UHD 4K (3840x2160)@60Hz and offers a refresh rate of up to 165Hz under 2K (2560*1440) resolution. It reduces flickering, providing a comfortable gaming experience without motion blur, screen tearing, or flickering. The DisplayPort to DisplayPort cable also supports DP, DP++, and DisplayPort++.

✨ [Ultra Durability] Unlike conventional PVC jackets, our DisplayPort 1.2 Cable features a high quality nylon braided jacket that can withstands over 15,000 bends, not easily broken anymore. This Display Cable designed with multiple shielding, 24K gold-plated connectors and 30 AWG tinned copper to ensure reliable interference-free data transmission, and improve transmission stability.

❤️ [Broad Compatibility] Easily connect a a DisplayPort compatible PC/Laptop to a monitor or projector with DisplayPort for crystal clear audio and high definition video. Our plug & play cable with its unique latch-free design makes plugging and unplugging effortless. Enjoy hassle-free connections and unleash the full potential of your devices.

🎁 [iVANKY's Customer Support] Each iVANKY cable undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure optimal functionality. We go beyond selling cables by providing expert technical support to every customer. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us. Additionally, customers who register their products on our website enjoy an extended 54-month warranty, combining 18 months plus an additional 36 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars IVANKY VESA Certified DisplayPort Cable
reviews.reviewText: If you're in need of a reliable and high-performance DisplayPort cable, look no further than the IVANKY VESA Certified DisplayPort Cable. As a gamer and tech enthusiast, I understand the importance of a quality cable to ensure smooth and uninterrupted connectivity between my devices. After using the IVANKY DisplayPort cable, I am thrilled to share my review of this exceptional product.First and foremost, the performance of this cable is outstanding. With support for 4K resolution at 60Hz, 2K resolution at 165Hz, and 2K resolution at 144Hz, it offers impressive visual clarity and fluidity. Whether you're a gamer seeking immersive graphics or a professional working with high-resolution content, this cable delivers exceptional picture quality and smooth refresh rates, enhancing your overall viewing experience.The VESA certification of this DisplayPort cable is a testament to its reliability and compatibility. It ensures that the cable meets the industry standards for quality and performance, giving you peace of mind knowing that you're using a trusted and tested product. Whether you're connecting a gaming monitor, graphics card, TV, PC, or laptop, this cable provides seamless compatibility across a range of devices.The gold-plated connectors not only add a touch of elegance but also serve a practical purpose. They offer enhanced conductivity and corrosion resistance, ensuring a stable and reliable connection. I appreciate the attention to detail in the construction of this cable, as the gold-plated connectors contribute to its durability and longevity, making it a wise investment for long-term use.The braided high-speed design of the IVANKY DisplayPort cable is another standout feature. The braided exterior not only adds to the cable's aesthetic appeal but also provides excellent durability and protection against wear and tear. It prevents tangling and keeps the cable neat and organized, making it ideal for both home setups and on-the-go use.The length of the cable, 6.6ft (2 meters), is adequate for most setups and offers flexibility in positioning your devices. Whether you need to connect your PC to a monitor or your laptop to a TV, this cable provides ample length to accommodate various setups without compromising signal quality or performance.In terms of value, the IVANKY DisplayPort cable is competitively priced considering its features and build quality. It offers a reliable and high-performance solution without breaking the bank. Compared to other cables on the market, this cable provides excellent value for money, making it a smart choice for those seeking a cost-effective DisplayPort solution.Overall, the IVANKY VESA Certified DisplayPort Cable is a top-notch product that exceeds expectations in terms of performance, durability, and compatibility. Whether you're a gamer, content creator, or professional in need of a reliable connection, this cable delivers on all fronts. With its impressive support for high resolutions and refresh rates, gold-plated connectors, braided design, and reasonable pricing, it's hard to find any faults with this cable.I highly recommend the IVANKY VESA Certified DisplayPort Cable to anyone seeking a premium-quality cable for their gaming monitor, graphics card, TV, PC, or laptop. With this cable, you can elevate your visual experience and enjoy seamless connectivity with confidence. IVANKY has truly delivered a fantastic product that will meet the demands of even the most discerning users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Ordered to connect Samsung curved monitor to a gaming rig, works perfect. Quality build with sturdy and aesthetically pleasing braided cord with good connectors that secure firmly into DSP ports. PC and Monitor connected flawlessly with great resolution and response. I’m getting full hz and fps now on games and creator software with no lagging, flickering, or screen tearing. Great product for the price and definitely recommended.

I hope the seller can pay attention to my issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best DP Cables
reviews.reviewText: My gaming experience has been elevated to new heights with the iVANKY VESA Certified DisplayPort Cable. This cable has proven to be an essential component in ensuring a seamless and high-quality connection between my gaming setup and the monitor.The VESA certification adds a layer of assurance regarding the cable's quality and compatibility. This DisplayPort cable is not just any cable; it meets the highest standards set by the VESA Association. Whether I'm streaming videos or engaging in intense gaming sessions, the cable effortlessly configures my 4K monitor for extended desktops or mirrored displays.One of the standout features is the flicker-free experience it provides. Supporting resolutions up to UHD 4K at 60Hz and offering a refresh rate of up to 165Hz under 2K resolution, the cable ensures a smooth and comfortable gaming experience. The reduction in flickering eliminates motion blur, screen tearing, and flickering, allowing me to fully immerse myself in the gaming world.Durability is another impressive aspect of this DisplayPort cable. The high-quality nylon braided jacket is a welcome departure from conventional PVC jackets. With the ability to withstand over 15,000 bends, it's clear that this cable is built to last. The multiple shielding, 24K gold-plated connectors, and 30 AWG tinned copper contribute to reliable interference-free data transmission, enhancing overall stability.The broad compatibility of the cable allows me to easily connect my DisplayPort-compatible PC/laptop to a monitor or projector, ensuring crystal clear audio and high-definition video. The plug-and-play design, with a latch-free mechanism, makes connecting and disconnecting effortless.What sets iVANKY apart is not just the quality of their products but also their commitment to customer support. The rigorous quality control ensures optimal functionality, and their expert technical support is readily available for any questions or concerns. Additionally, the extended 54-month warranty, which includes 18 months plus an additional 36 months for registered products, adds an extra layer of confidence in the longevity and reliability of the cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ivanky Vesa displayport cable provides an excellent picture on my Asus monitor
reviews.reviewText: The Asus monitor comes with an HDMI cable. This display port cable works much better and provides excellent color and definition. This upgrade is fairly inexpensive, but well worth it!t

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what you need
reviews.reviewText: I got this cable for my monitor upgrade in my home office. At first the Dell monitor would not work with it. But then I read on-line that the Dell monitors are persnickety about the connector being well seated. So I pushed it in harder and lo and behold, it worked.It is good quality and I have confidence this will last longer than the monitor. It's a good cable. If you need a DisplayPort to DisplayPort cable, this is the one to get.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cable works as promised and great price.
reviews.reviewText: I've now confirmed that my previous display port cable was the issue in causing my monitor to lose image whenever I would reposition it physically around the swivel arm I have set up. It was very annoying and I would have to remove/reconnect from the back of the display in hopes of getting the image back. This issue has been eliminated by replacing the old Display Port cable (was nylon not braided) with this new iVANKY braided display cable. I'm very satisfied.

Cable muy resistente y el de mejor precio a comparación de otros de aquí de Amazon. Probablemente en tiendas físicas hay mejor precio, pero me urgía y llegó a tiempo. Ha estado funcionando bien y llevo con él unos 2 meses.
Running gaming monitor 1440p at 144hz 1ms does an excellent job

The display cable was exactly as described. Used it to connect a 4K 28 inch Samsung monitor and the picture was excellent. I cannot say if it was much better than the HDMI cable that I was using previously. My eyes cannot detect much difference!
